p: MDCK cell monolayers were infected with IFV at 2 PFU/cell for 1 h at room temperature. RS was added to the culture medium at concentrations of 50 and 500 Î¼g/mL 3 h before infection, during infection, at 1 h post-infection (p.i.), at 3 h p.i., or at 6 h p.i. The culture media were harvested at 24 h p.i. and subjected to plaque assay.
